word:
I THANK THE LORD I AM FREE FROM BODILY PAINS, BUT AM 
                                                                           224
ONLY FEEBLE WITH AGE.  IF I CANNOT GET ABOUT IN PUBLIC LABORS AS FORMERLY, I THANK GOD THAT, AS SISTER WHITE SAID TO A SISTER WHO HAD BEEN AN ACTIVE BIBLE WORKER WHEN IN HEALTH BUT WAS UNABLE THUS LONGER TO WORK, "SISTER, YOU CAN WORK NOW AS WELL AS FORMERLY--YOU CAN PRAY FOR THOSE WHO HAVE HEALTH TO BE ACTIVELY ENGAGED IN THE GREAT HARVEST FIELD OF LABOR."
